div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.span: Arbor Vitae - Woodruff Elementary School (AV-W School) provides a rich and active, yet fundamental, educational program to children in grades pre-kindergarten through eighth grade. Exemplary student work and performance is the primary goal at AV-W School. We believe that all children

span.span: to learn and we prepare our students to become knowing inquirers and participants in their own learning. We set high expectations for student achievement and provide necessary support to enable each and every student to achieve these expectations.

a.title: Last day of school for Students
a.span: Last day of school for Students

p.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: arial, sans-serif; background-color: rgb(234, 234, 213); text-align: center;

img.title: Muskies Hunting
img.style: left: 60px; top: 154px; width: 790px; height: 159px; text-align: center; border-width: 5px; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(255, 0, 0);

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; line-height: normal; font-size: 14px;

em.strong: "AV-W is committed to empowering each student

span.em: to make a positive difference and to achieve personal

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; line-height: normal; font-size: 12px; font-family: 'Century Gothic'; min-height: 15px;
p.span: We can be compassionate by showing others that we care. We can be kind, helpful and understanding.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; line-height: normal; font-size: 12px;

span.br: Muskies will show courage by taking positive risks and overcoming the fear of leaving their comfort zone.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; line-height: normal; font-size: 12px; min-height: 15px;
margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; line-height: normal; font-size: 12px;
p.span: I will show integrity by always doing the right thing, even when no one is watching or when the right thing is not popular.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; line-height: normal; font-size: 12px; min-height: 15px;
margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; line-height: normal; font-size: 12px;
p.span: I will show craftsmanship by always doing my best and working diligently to produce work I am proud of.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; line-height: normal; font-size: 12px; min-height: 15px;
margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; line-height: normal; font-size: 12px;
p.span: We will work to the best of our ability by participating in class, asking questions and studying hard.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; line-height: normal; font-size: 12px; min-height: 15px;
margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; box-sizing: border-box; line-height: normal; font-size: 12px;
p.span:
We are in control of our future.
(The Model Musky Pledge was written by the students and staff in 2012. This pledge keeps students focused and committed to the Core Values and Habits of Scholarship of AVW. The Model Musky Pledge is recited daily by students and staff as a ritual that supports learning and character development.)
